function 8

func:
from datetime import datetime
tmp ={}
chart = {"series":[],"data":[],"labels":[]}
data =[]

import_data = msg["payload"]["feeds"]
for val in import_data:
    datetime_obj = datetime.strptime(val["created_at"], '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')
    timestamp = (datetime_obj - datetime(1970, 1, 1)).total_seconds()
    # timestamp = datetime_obj.timestamp()
    if val["field1"] != None:
        data.append({"x":val["created_at"],"y":float(val["field1"].replace('"',''))})

chart["series"] = ["A"]
chart["labels"] = [""]

chart["data"] = [data]
tmp["payload"] = [chart]
return tmp

from datetime import datetime
tmp ={}
chart = {"series":[],"data":[],"labels":[]}
data =[]

import_data = msg["payload"]["feeds"]
for val in import_data:
    datetime_obj = datetime.strptime(val["created_at"], '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')
    timestamp = (datetime_obj - datetime(1970, 1, 1)).total_seconds()
    # timestamp = datetime_obj.timestamp()
    if val["field2"] != None:
        data.append({"x":val["created_at"],"y":float(val["field2"].replace('"',''))})

chart["series"] = ["A"]
chart["labels"] = [""]

chart["data"] = [data]
tmp["payload"] = [chart]
return tmp

name: Time Picker
format:
<html>
<body>
   <form>
      <label for="meet">Meeting Time :</label>
      <input type="time" id="time1">
   </form>

   <script>
   $(function() {
      $('#time1').on('input', function() {
         var time = $(this).val();
         var msg = { payload: time };
         node.send(msg);
      });
   });
   </script>
</body>
</html>
